title: How to Replace a Faucet
text: This workshop teaches you step by step how to replace kitchen, sink, and bathtub faucets. A Home Improvement staff will walk you through a live demo and afterwards give you the opportunity to practice (with assistance of course).
categoryInfo: Workshops led by women for women. Suitable for women of all ages and backgrounds to learn home improvement skills in similar company. Workshops are led by highly trained and knowledgeable Home Improvement staff. All materials supplied by Home Improvement.

title: Dry Wall Repair
text: Holes in the walls of your rental? No worries! This workshop teaches you how to repair small holes in drywall. A Home Improvement staff will walk you through a live demo while you practice in real time (with assistance of course).
categoryInfo: Workshops led by women for women. Suitable for women of all ages and backgrounds to learn home improvement skills in similar company. Workshops are led by highly trained and knowledgeable Home Improvement staff. All materials supplied by Home Improvement.

title: Tile Backsplash Install
text: Wanting to learn how to install backsplash in your kitchen? Look no further! With the help of live demos from trained staff and the opportunity to DIY, you'll have all the know-how to make your kitchen pop.
categoryInfo: Workshops led by women for women. Suitable for women of all ages and backgrounds to learn home improvement skills in similar company. Workshops are led by highly trained and knowledgeable Home Improvement staff. All materials supplied by Home Improvement.
